Question
========
In which of the following situations is MANOVA an appropriate analysis model?

Answerlist
----------
* When examining the effect of gender and education level on the students' achievement in mathematics
* If you examine the effect of gender and education level on the students' achievement in mathematics and literature together
* If you examine the effect of gender on scholars' achievement in mathematics
* If you examine the effect of gender and educational attainment on the achievement of scholars in mathematics and literature separately

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* False
* True
* False
* False
